author: mkirsano
body:
#### PR description:

This PR add reco::GenParticle collection production from HepMC3 event record. In addition, JetPlotsExample of RecoJets/JetAnalyzers is repared in order to test GenJets production

#### PR validation:

Validated using the full chain GEN-SIM configuration from GeneratorInterface/Pythia8Interface/test and JetPlotsExample
title: Hepmc3togenparticles
